# aes-drawer



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                                        |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `"content"` | The markup to show in the fly-out drawer. Can be anything.         |
| `"trigger"` | Anything placed in here becomes a button that opens drawer content |


## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [aes-icon](../aes-icon)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  aes-drawer --> aes-icon
  style aes-drawer fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
